meanings: (어떤 장소로) come, (나타나다) turn up, show up, (방문하다) visit
Something that is supposed to come has come
One's coming day is a market day
without saying that one comes and leaves

vlive.korean: 오자마자... As soon as I got here... 듣기 View video BTS : BTS Live : 전 눈물이 없는 사람입니다 😭
vlive.english: As soon as I got here...

vlive.korean: 오자마자? As soon as you came? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 속마음 얘기 안 하는 남친 심리 [한입만] - EP.04
[오자마자 밥 서치] 중국요리 먹을까? [Looking for something to eat] Chinese food? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [SKZ VLOG] 리노 : 리노, 하고 싶은 거 다 하지 마
vlive.english: [Looking for something to eat] Chinese food?

vlive.korean: 오자마자 뭐 먹었냐고요? What did I eat as soon as I came? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 스윗한 태현이의 스윗한거 만들기
vlive.english: What did I eat as soon as I came?

vlive.korean: 저희가 오자마자 웰컴 디저트라고 그래야 되나요? As soon as we arrived... Should we call it a welcome dessert? 듣기 View video N.Flying : 우리 얘기 좀 합시다 #37
vlive.english: As soon as we arrived... Should we call it a welcome dessert?

examples.korean: I’ve got into the habit of turning on the TV as soon as I get home. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 집에 오자마자 TV를 켜는 것이 버릇이 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve got into the habit of turning on the TV as soon as I get home. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Immediately he came, he told me so. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 오자마자 내게 그렇게 말했다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Immediately he came, he told me so. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: No sooner had he arrived home than he was asked to start on another journey. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 집에 오자마자 그는 다른 여행을 떠났다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: No sooner had he arrived home than he was asked to start on another journey. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As soon as I got home, I practiced what I had learned at the cooking institute. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 집에 오자마자 나는 요리 학원에서 배운 것을 실습해 보았다 Neungyule
examples.english: As soon as I got home, I practiced what I had learned at the cooking institute. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I was so tired that I zonked out as soon as I got home. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 너무 피곤해서 집에 오자마자 바로 곯아떨어졌다 Neungyule
examples.english: I was so tired that I zonked out as soon as I got home. Add to Wordbook
